question:
Your friend invited you to his/her party, but you are unable to attend.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter
•explain why you cannot come•
give your reason for not contacting your friend sooner
•suggest another time to meet
text: I wanted to let you know that I am not attending your birthday party due to some reason and I apologize for it.

I want to attend your birthday event, but my situation will not allow me to attend it. Yesterday, I have suddenly received a call from my grandfather, and he told me that granny slipped from the staircase. What's more, she got hospitalized as her arm was severely injured,So, I had to go there in the evening. Although my grandfather is there with my grandmother, he cannot handle all these things alone.

My grandparents are residing in the countryside area, so the signal network of this area is very low. That's why I am unable to contact you in this regard early. Moreover, I wish you a happy birthday through this letter because I have no other option than to contact you.

I'm sorry once again, and could you please tell me when you are available after this week. I would like to go to the dinner party as I am on the holiday from next week when I come back to Delhi. I hope you will understand my situation.
I'm looking forward to seeing you.
